Events that occurred on 10 January.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1914 - Scholar Angus McIntosh, pupil and friend of J.R.R. Tolkien, is born.
1934 - Arne Zettersten, colleague and friend of J.R.R. Tolkien, is born.
1938 - J.R.R. Tolkien goes to London to rehearse his talk at the BBC, four days later.
1947 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to A.W. Riddle.
1957 - Bertram Rota writes to William Ready considering the sale of Tolkien's manuscripts to Marquette University.
1958 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to his grandson Michael George Tolkien.
1959 - Screenwriter Fran Walsh is born.
1964 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to the Royal Society of Literature.
1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Timothy J. Wheeler.
1981 - Voice actor Richard Boone dies.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
The Fellowship of the Ring travels towards Caradhras.
